LABEL: 0x25
STRING: The sound of the waves woke me up.

LABEL: 0x49
STRING: ――The rhythm of the swaying motions flowed comfortably down my back.

LABEL: 0x7F
STRING: It was like I was drifting on the sea,

LABEL: 0xA3
STRING: among the waves――

LABEL: 0xCB
STRING: ――The surface of the sea.

LABEL: 0x101
STRING: That's right, we needed to get out of here...

LABEL: 0x12F
STRING: Was I knocked unconscious by the terrible tremors?

LABEL: 0x15B
STRING: I opened my eyes, but it was pitch black, and I couldn't see anything.

LABEL: 0x191
STRING: I couldn't hear a thing.

LABEL: 0x1AF
STRING: I didn't understand anything.

LABEL: 0x1CD
STRING: Was I alive or dead...?

LABEL: 0x1FF
STRING: But, this huge surge...

LABEL: 0x229
STRING: Rhythmic vibrations.

LABEL: 0x24B
STRING: ――Waves.

LABEL: 0x261
STRING: 「It's the surface...!」

LABEL: 0x281
STRING: Trying to get up from the seat reminded me that my body was immobilized.

LABEL: 0x2CF
STRING: I was fastened to my seat.

LABEL: 0x313
STRING: I didn't think I'd be thrown around so much... Without this, I'd be dead.

LABEL: 0x378
STRING: One by one, I removed the bindings on my limbs and torso.

LABEL: 0x3BE
STRING: 「Is... everyone all right?!」

LABEL: 0x3E6
STRING: There was no reply.

LABEL: 0x400
STRING: I reached out, fumbling―that's right.

LABEL: 0x42E
STRING: I turned on the wristwatch on my left arm.

LABEL: 0x4BF
STRING: Relying on its light, I headed for the exit.

LABEL: 0x529
STRING: 「Oh, sorry.」

LABEL: 0x549
STRING: Suddenly, Reiri woke up, perhaps from the light hitting her face.

LABEL: 0x5B9
STRING: 「What's wrong, Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x5EA
STRING: 「Nothing...」

LABEL: 0x604
STRING: 「I'm probably just deeply moved.」

LABEL: 0x635
STRING: Say what?

LABEL: 0x666
STRING: When I opened the door of the theater room,

LABEL: 0x692
STRING: the barely lit hallway lights illuminated the room.

LABEL: 0x6CC
STRING: Everyone was waking up, one by one, as if the morning sun was shining down on them.

LABEL: 0x774
STRING: 「Did we really... make it to the surface?」

LABEL: 0x7A7
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x7D8
STRING: Each of them were removing themselves from their seats.

LABEL: 0x802
STRING: Everything... was over.

LABEL: 0x822
STRING: We succeeded... didn't we?

LABEL: 0x846
STRING: This fluffy sensation didn't feel real.

LABEL: 0x885
STRING: 「――This, too, is the result of my calculations.」

LABEL: 0x8C5
STRING: 「There's no way I'd make a mistake.」

LABEL: 0x8F6
STRING: Tokiwa proudly asked Hiragino and Touri to remove her from her seat

LABEL: 0x944
STRING: since she couldn't do it herself.

LABEL: 0x964
STRING: However, despite her confident words and behavior, her face looked like she was about to cry.

LABEL: 0x9BE
STRING: Eventually, everyone got out of their restraints.

LABEL: 0x9FB
STRING: 「Let's go to the wheelhouse.」

LABEL: 0xA21
STRING: 「We should be able to see the outside world from there.」

LABEL: 0xCC8
STRING: We hurried down the dimly lit hallway,

LABEL: 0xCEC
STRING: and opened the door to the wheelhouse――

LABEL: 0xDE0
STRING: ――Light.

LABEL: 0xDF6
STRING: Light was shining in through the large window.

LABEL: 0xE22
STRING: Was this... sunlight?

LABEL: 0xE40
STRING: The sky spread out before us.

LABEL: 0xE58
STRING: It was the same clear blue as three days ago――

LABEL: 0xE81
STRING: We were definitely on the surface... however...

LABEL: 0xEAB
STRING: Why was the sun already starting to rise?

LABEL: 0xEDD
STRING: It should still be before dawn...

LABEL: 0xF15
STRING: Don't tell me we'd slept in the theater room for over an hour?

LABEL: 0xF6D
STRING: 「POL, what time is it?」

LABEL: 0xFE5
STRING: ...It was too early for the sun to rise, as I thought.

LABEL: 0x1013
STRING: What the hell was going on...?

LABEL: 0x10F7
STRING: 「The sea――」

LABEL: 0x116E
STRING: 「I can see the sea――!」

LABEL: 0x1195
STRING: Touri looked back and spoke happily.

LABEL: 0x11C3
STRING: You've seen it before, haven't you? Not that I was going to say that to her...

LABEL: 0x120B
STRING: It wasn't the darkness of the deep sea, but a verdant expanse spreading out before us.

LABEL: 0x123F
STRING: The blue sea was shining bright, filled with hope.

LABEL: 0x1298
STRING: 「Reiri――」

LABEL: 0x12B2
STRING: 「The sea was blue, wasn't it?」

LABEL: 0x12E9
STRING: 「Touri...!」

LABEL: 0x130C
STRING: Before I knew it, Touri was hugging Reiri.

LABEL: 0x1340
STRING: Reiri struggled in pain as she was embraced from the front.

LABEL: 0x137A
STRING: But, once she managed to free her face and secure her airways, she accepted her sister's embrace.

LABEL: 0x1497
STRING: 「Thank you, Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x1516
STRING: 「And... I'm sorry.」

LABEL: 0x15D1
STRING: 「I didn't understand anything about you.」

LABEL: 0x1607
STRING: 「You can live on your own.」

LABEL: 0x1641
STRING: 「There's something you want to do, and you're trying your best to do it...」

LABEL: 0x168D
STRING: 「I thought I had to protect you, and couldn't trust you...」

LABEL: 0x16E3
STRING: 「But the truth is... I don't have anything.」

LABEL: 0x1717
STRING: 「I was afraid that you would leave me behind and go away by yourself...」

LABEL: 0x1800
STRING: 「But, it's okay now.」

LABEL: 0x1887
STRING: 「I'll be able to live on my own now.」

LABEL: 0x1935
STRING: 「...So you finally figured it out. Well, it's a good thing you realized it.」

LABEL: 0x197F
STRING: 「It's time for the both of us to stand on our own two feet.」

LABEL: 0x1A1A
STRING: 「There's still more I want to do. And things I need to do.」

LABEL: 0x1A64
STRING: 「I can't afford to be stuck like this. Therefore――」

LABEL: 0x1B0F
STRING: 「Let's just leave the clingy stuff at that, okay?」

LABEL: 0x1B82
STRING: Beside me, Hiragino patted Yukari on the shoulder.

LABEL: 0x1C81
STRING: 「Yukari... Well done.」

LABEL: 0x1CA3
STRING: 「It's thanks to you, the chief attendant, that we were able to escape safely despite that accident.」

LABEL: 0x1D12
STRING: 「I... Thank you very much.」

LABEL: 0x1DA7
STRING: 「But, what's with that condescending tone of voice? Cut it out, sensei.」

LABEL: 0x1E5E
STRING: 「Besides, I didn't do anything. Rather――」

LABEL: 0x1EF3
STRING: 「Despite that unfortunate accident, everyone was able to escape without giving up hope.」

LABEL: 0x1F9E
STRING: 「It's all thanks to you, Hiragino-sensei.」

LABEL: 0x2030
STRING: 「...Yukari. Isn't it about time you stopped calling me that?」

LABEL: 0x20EC
STRING: 「What do you mean?」

LABEL: 0x217A
STRING: 「Don't play dumb with me. Why are you all "sensei" this and "sensei" that when you've known me for the longest time?」

LABEL: 0x21CA
STRING: 「Is it out of spite? Or did someone instill it into you?」

LABEL: 0x220E
STRING: 「I'm not saying you're the same as Tokiwa-kun, but...」

LABEL: 0x22B0
STRING: 「I don't want to. Actually, aren't you the one being way too familiar with me?」

LABEL: 0x2353
STRING: 「Also, don't use this escape as an excuse to call me by my first name.」

LABEL: 0x2482
STRING: Tokiwa was by herself, gazing out at the blue sea.

LABEL: 0x24B0
STRING: She walked over to the window, rubbed her forehead against it, and peered through it.

LABEL: 0x2500
STRING: The sea that Hikari wanted to see.

LABEL: 0x2522
STRING: ――I wondered what had happened to her.

LABEL: 0x2550
STRING: I was sure she had already reached the surface and had been rescued by ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x25A4
STRING: Just a little longer, and you'll meet her again.

LABEL: 0x25DD
STRING: 「Rumi-chan...」

LABEL: 0x25FD
STRING: 「Your sister fulfilled her promise.」

LABEL: 0x2637
STRING: 「Please, wait just a little longer.」

LABEL: 0x26E1
STRING: As I watched the morning sunrise outside the window, I finally understood.

LABEL: 0x271D
STRING: 「I see... Because of the change in the navigation program, all the clocks on the ship were off by an hour.」

LABEL: 0x2780
STRING: 「That's why the time was off...」

LABEL: 0x27AC
STRING: An unexpected one-hour gap.

LABEL: 0x27D3
STRING: I couldn't see the starry sky, but...

LABEL: 0x27FF
STRING: Fortunately, I made it in time for the sunrise.

LABEL: 0x2831
STRING: The moment that brought hope for a new day――

LABEL: 0x2865
STRING: 「...Whoops.」

LABEL: 0x288E
STRING: 「Kyah!」

LABEL: 0x28AD
STRING: Spurred on by the strong waves, my feet wobbled.

LABEL: 0x28DB
STRING: The <SHEEP III> floated on the waves and rotated to the right.

LABEL: 0x292A
STRING: The wheelhouse window, which had been facing the sea, now turned to face the land――

LABEL: 0x296E
STRING: Outside the window,

LABEL: 0x2986
STRING: was a scene I hadn't seen until now.

LABEL: 0x2A2D
STRING: Instantly.

LABEL: 0x2A41
STRING: I was at a loss for words.

LABEL: 0x2A5D
STRING: The symbol of restoration floating in Kurama Bay.

LABEL: 0x2A87
STRING: An artificial island that used advanced technology to create energy.

LABEL: 0x2ACA
STRING: 「The <Isle of Wind>... is burning...」

LABEL: 0x2AFF
STRING: The white windmills were cruelly collapsed, having lost their blades,

LABEL: 0x2B35
STRING: and were billowing black smoke toward the sky.

LABEL: 0x2B63
STRING: Red flames were rising from the foot of the artificial island,

LABEL: 0x2B99
STRING: and its pure white appearance was long gone.

LABEL: 0x2BD5
STRING: Just like the Aqualine seven years ago...

LABEL: 0x2C08
STRING: 「Is this the "Fifth Day"...?」

LABEL: 0x2C91
STRING: I had to know.

LABEL: 0x2CB5
STRING: What was happening here on the surface.

LABEL: 0x2CE3
STRING: What kind of a disaster had occurred――

LABEL: 0x2D46
STRING: I heard the sound of footsteps behind me.

LABEL: 0x2D6A
STRING: And not just one person's.

LABEL: 0x2D86
STRING: The sound of many people's footsteps were approaching us.

LABEL: 0x2E1B
STRING: I naturally braced myself and looked at the door to the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x2E57
STRING: And then, a group of men appeared, their faces covered by masks.

LABEL: 0x2EA3
STRING: ――It was exactly like the group on the first day, fully protected.

LABEL: 0x2EE7
STRING: Which meant that they were from ROMLES――

LABEL: 0x2F17
STRING: 「There!」

LABEL: 0x2F33
STRING: 「――Survivors!!」

LABEL: 0x2F55
STRING: Calling out to their comrades, they entered the wheelhouse and approached us.

LABEL: 0x2FA5
STRING: 「Are you hurt?」

LABEL: 0x2FC5
STRING: 「Ah.」

LABEL: 0x2FDB
STRING: 「Are there any survivors in the other rooms?」

LABEL: 0x3012
STRING: 「This is everyone on this ship.」

LABEL: 0x3043
STRING: 「All right―let's go outside. Can you walk?」

LABEL: 0x3071
STRING: I nodded my head in silence.

LABEL: 0x308F
STRING: One by one, we were called out and taken away.

LABEL: 0x30D1
STRING: It was finally over.

LABEL: 0x30EF
STRING: We'd be rescued, and everything would end――

LABEL: 0x311F
STRING: And so, before me, as I waited for my turn...

LABEL: 0x314F
STRING: ...A figure suddenly approached me.

LABEL: 0x317D
STRING: I couldn't see their face behind the full-face mask.

LABEL: 0x31B1
STRING: I braced myself for a moment, but looking at them again, they were slender and not very tall.

LABEL: 0x3205
STRING: The person stopped in front of me without saying a word as I braced myself.

LABEL: 0x3263
STRING: 「Huh? Ah―!」

LABEL: 0x3285
STRING: In an instant, I understood everything.

LABEL: 0x32AF
STRING: Who this person was.

LABEL: 0x32D7
STRING: My vision blurred, and I wiped away my tears.

LABEL: 0x335F
STRING: ――Finally, we meet.

LABEL: 0x34EA
STRING: 「...We've finished checking all the sections.」

LABEL: 0x3511
STRING: 「Here's the report――」

LABEL: 0x3551
STRING: We were put on several rescue boats as we departed the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x3598
STRING: We left the sea behind.

LABEL: 0x3604
STRING: 「It's 05:18 AM. We've completed our investigation of all the sections.」

LABEL: 0x3655
STRING: The shadow of the <SHEEP III> was getting smaller and smaller.

LABEL: 0x3684
STRING: It was the wreckage of the cage where we had spent our days in.

LABEL: 0x36B6
STRING: The sun was rising.

LABEL: 0x36D4
STRING: We had overcome the worst-case scenario, and a new day was about to begin.

LABEL: 0x3764
STRING: 「Yes... with this, we've confirmed the number

LABEL: Custom2
STRING: of survivors inside the <SHEEP III>.」

LABEL: 0x37C7
STRING: This wouldn't be a tragic story that went down in history.

LABEL: 0x37F3
STRING: A commonplace ending like this was fine.

LABEL: 0x381F
STRING: Even if it didn't remain in people's memories,

LABEL: 0x3853
STRING: even if it wasn't passed down,

LABEL: 0x387D
STRING: we were still alive.

LABEL: 0x38AB
STRING: We would live to see the morning we had seized with our own hands, and the world beyond that.

LABEL: 0x3935
STRING: 「I repeat.」

LABEL: 0x39BD
STRING: 「The total number of survivors of the <SHEEP III> disaster is six.

LABEL: 0x39F3
STRING: ――We're transporting them now.」
